thread.title: Is your baby monitor safe? Cybersecurity firms says many can be hacked
thread.title_full: Is your baby monitor safe? Cybersecurity firms says many can be hacked

title: Is your baby monitor safe? Cybersecurity firms says many can be hacked
text:
Topix › Science / Technology › Is your baby monitor safe? Cybersecur... Is your baby monitor safe? Cybersecurity firms says many can be hacked Next Story Prev Story 1 hr ago Read more: CBC News 
Several of the most popular Internet-connected baby monitors lack basic security features, making them vulnerable to even the most basic hacking attempts, according to a new report from a cybersecurity firm. The possibility of an unknown person watching their baby's every move is a frightening thought for many parents who have come to rely on the devices to keep an eye on their little ones. Start the conversation, or Read more at CBC News.
